title: Hour 3 - Bubba Watson and Boomer Esiason (04-16-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Bubba Watson and Boomer Esiason (04-16-20)
description:
Bubba Watson says he can talk trash much better than he can play golf. Boomer Esiason clarifies his Joe Burrow comparison to Lebron James.
